comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content:
The National Probate Calendar shows that his usual place of residence was at The Vicarage, Tipton, Staffordshire. Probate was granted to Rev Wilson Thomas De Vine.
He was born circa 1883 in Oulton, Stone, Staffordshire, the son of Wilson Thomas De Vine. In 1911 he was living with his widowed father at the vicarage in Tipton and gave his occupation as Solicitor.
